name: Derma Roller for Skin, Hair & Beard – Women and Men Titanium Microneedling Roller for Face & Scalp, Safe & Easy to Use 0.25mm
short_description: Titanium Microneedling Roller – Sterilized & Durable – Made with 540 high-quality titanium needles, ensuring durability and safety. Includes a sterilized roller and storage case to keep it clean.

Easy to Use – Perfect for Beginners – Designed for both men and women, this micro dermaroller is easy to use on the scalp, beard, face, and skin. A simple at-home microneedling tool for all experience levels. It has a needle length of 0.25mm

How to Use & How Often – Use 1-3 times per week, applying gentle pressure to the desired area. Roll 4–6 times in each direction (vertical, horizontal, diagonal). Ideal for those looking for a scalp roller, beard roller, or microneedling roller for skin.
How to Clean & Replace – Rinse with alcohol or warm water after each use. Replace every 1-2 months. A hygienic, easy-to-maintain tool with a protective case for storage.

Trusted Brand – Lexi White Beauty – As seen on top beauty platforms, Lexi White Beauty’s derma roller is designed for safe, consistent use. Protected by our 100% refund or replacement satisfaction guarantee.

name: Derma Roller Microneedle 6 Piece Kit [DERMAROLL by Prosper Beauty] Face Roller with 4 Replaceable Heads Exfoliation Microdermabrasion Micro Derma Skin Care Tool Dermaplaning Microneedling
short_description: ★ THE BEST DERMA ROLLER ON THE MARKET - Designed by healthcare professionals with safety and hygiene as a priority, DERMAROLL contains 600 titanium micro needles with 4 replaceable roller heads (1 attached + 3 additional). Titanium needles are 3-4 times stronger than stainless steel and will last longer and stay sharper, preventing injury to your skin. Other derma rollers have less than 600 needles, use stainless steel needles, and do not have replaceable heads. Handle and storage case included.

★ PRIORITIZING SAFETY AND HYGIENE WITH REPLACEABLE HEADS - Roller head refills included to prioritize proper hygiene, safe and sanitary usage, and reduce the discomfort of dull needles. We are the FIRST and ONLY derma roller that offers new and sanitized replacement roller heads in each kit. Roller heads should be replaced after 3-5 uses (similar but more frequent that razor blades) to prioritize proper hygiene to prevent skin damage and infection.

★ REPLACEMENT HEADS AVAILABLE - Instead of buying a brand new derma roller after it’s worn out, you can now buy DERMAROLL REFILLS which contain 4 replacement rollers heads at a fraction of the cost of competitor’s derma rollers. Protect your skin by practicing safe and sanitary dermarolling techniques and replacing your derma roller head regularly. DERMAROLL is simply the safest, most hygienic, and easily the best value in derma rolling today.
★ PERFECT FOR SKINCARE - Microneedling facilitates exfoliation, improves skin’s appearance with a luminous look and gives skin a smoother feel.

★ SAFE FOR HOME USE - Short 0.25mm micro needles are non-invasive, safe to use at home, painless, do not penetrate living layers of skin. Safe and professional quality treatment with the convenience and comfort at home.
